description: Returns a list of images created by the specified pipeline.

parameters.name: imagePipelineArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image pipeline whose images you want to view.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use the following filters to streamline results: name version (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a list operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: imageSummaryList
nested_items.description: The list of images built by this pipeline.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the image.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this image produces an AMI or a container image.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the image.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The image operating system platform, such as Linux or Windows.

nested_items.name: osVersion
nested_items.description: The operating system version of the instances that launch from this image. For example, Amazon Linux 2, Ubuntu 18, or Microsoft Windows Server 2019.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the image.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: The reason for the status of the image.

nested_items.name: owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the image.

nested_items.name: dateCreated
nested_items.description: The date on which Image Builder created this image.

nested_items.name: outputResources
nested_items.description: The output resources that Image Builder produced when it created this image.

nested_items.name: amis
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 AMIs created by this image.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the Amazon EC2 AMI.

nested_items.name: image
nested_items.description: The AMI ID of the Amazon EC2 AMI.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon EC2 AMI.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the Amazon EC2 AMI. Minimum and maximum length are in characters.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the image.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: The reason for the status of the image.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The account ID of the owner of the AMI.

nested_items.name: containers
nested_items.description: Container images that the pipeline has generated and stored in the output repository.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: Containers and container images are Region-specific. This is the Region context for the container.

nested_items.name: imageUris
nested_items.description: A list of URIs for containers created in the context Region.
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: buildType
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of build that created this image. The build can be initiated in the following ways:

nested_items.name: imageSource
nested_items.description: The origin of the base image that Image Builder used to build this image.

nested_items.name: deprecationTime
nested_items.description: The time when deprecation occurs for an image resource. This can be a past or future date.

nested_items.name: lifecycleExecutionId
nested_items.description: Identifies the last runtime instance of the lifecycle policy to take action on the image.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The next token used for paginated responses. When this field isn't empty, there are additional elements that the service hasn't included in this request. Use this token with the next request to retrieve additional objects.
